name: OpenAI
natural_language_description: 这是 OpenAI 节点。主要用于: Consume Open AI

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice
oldVersionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: text
available_options: Chat (值: chat)
Image (值: image)
Text (值: text)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: complete
available_options: Complete (值: complete) - Create one or more completions for a given text
Edit (值: edit) - Create an edited version for a given text
Moderate (值: moderate) - Classify if a text violates OpenAI's content policy
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

model.name: model
model.description: The model which will classify the text. Learn more.
model.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 作用: The model which will classify the text. Learn more. | 默认值: text-moderation-latest
available_options: text-moderation-stable (值: text-moderation-stable)
text-moderation-latest (值: text-moderation-latest)

chatModel.name: chatModel
chatModel.description: The model which will generate the completion. Learn more.
chatModel.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 作用: The model which will generate the completion. Learn more. | 默认值: gpt-3.5-turbo

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.description: The prompt to generate completion(s) for
prompt.natural_language_description: 参数名: Prompt | 作用: The prompt to generate completion(s) for

simplifyOutput.name: simplifyOutput
simplifyOutput.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simplifyOutput.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 作用: Additional options to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: echo (值: None) - Whether the prompt should be echo back in addition to the completion
frequency_penalty (值: None) - Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim
maxTokens (值: None) - The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion. Most models have a context length of 2048 tokens (except for the newest models, which support 32,768).

n (值: None) - How many completions to generate for each prompt. Note: Because this parameter generates many completions, it can quickly consume your token quota. Use carefully and ensure that you have reasonable settings for max_tokens and stop.
presence_penalty (值: None) - Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics
temperature (值: None) - Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.
topP (值: None) - Controls diversity via nucleus sampling: 0.5 means half of all likelihood-weighted options are considered. We generally recommend altering this or temperature but not both.

imageModel.name: imageModel
imageModel.description: The model to use for image generation
imageModel.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 作用: The model to use for image generation | 默认值: dall-e-2

responseFormat.name: responseFormat
responseFormat.description: The format in which to return the image(s)
responseFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Format | 作用: The format in which to return the image(s) | 默认值: binaryData
available_options: Binary File (值: binaryData)
Image Url (值: imageUrl)

input.name: input
input.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input | 作用: The input text to classify

instruction.name: instruction
instruction.description: The instruction that tells the model how to edit the input text
instruction.natural_language_description: 参数名: Instruction | 作用: The instruction that tells the model how to edit the input text

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: batching (值: None)
allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
